summary: December 31 is the 365th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
December 31 is the 365th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
It is widely known as New Year's Eve since the following day is New Year's Day. It is the last day of the year. The following day is January 1 of the following year.
title: December 31
